org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.its.generator

Class AuthorityCertGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.its.generator.BaseCertGenerator
      • org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.its.generator.AuthorityCertGenerator

  • public class AuthorityCertGenerator
extends BaseCertGenerator
    Certificate Generator class for generating certificates of types: RootCA, Authorization Authority and Enrollment Authority.
    Author:
    Philip Vendil, p.vendil@cgi.com

    • Method Detail

      • genRootCA

        public Certificate genRootCA(byte[] subjectName,
                    List<BigInteger> itsAidList,
                    int assuranceLevel,
                    int confidenceLevel,
                    Date validFrom,
                    Date validTo,
                    GeographicRegion geographicRegion,
                    PublicKeyAlgorithm signingPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                    PublicKey signPublicKey,
                    PrivateKey signPrivateKey,
                    PublicKeyAlgorithm encPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                    PublicKey encPublicKey)
                      throws IllegalArgumentException,
                             SignatureException,
                             IOException
        Method to generate a self signed root CA.
        Parameters:
        subjectName - the subject name to use in the certificate, null for empty name. Max 32 bytes.
        itsAidList - list of ITS AID values, Required
        assuranceLevel - the assurance level to use, 0-7, Required
        confidenceLevel - the confidence level to use, 0-3, Required
        validFrom - the valid from date in certificate, Required
        validTo - the valid to date in certificate, Required
        geographicRegion - the region the certificate should be valid, null for no geographic region.
        signingPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for signing and verification, Required
        signPublicKey - public key used for verification of this certificate, Required
        signPrivateKey - private key used to sign this certificate, Required
        encPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        encPublicKey - public key used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        Returns:
        a new self signed certificate with root CA profile.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if supplied arguments was illegal.
        SignatureException - if internal signature problems occurred.
        IOException - if communication problems with underlying systems occurred generating the certificate.

      • genAuthorizationAuthorityCA

        public Certificate genAuthorizationAuthorityCA(byte[] subjectName,
                                      List<BigInteger> itsAidList,
                                      int assuranceLevel,
                                      int confidenceLevel,
                                      Date validFrom,
                                      Date validTo,
                                      GeographicRegion geographicRegion,
                                      PublicKeyAlgorithm signingPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                                      PublicKey signPublicKey,
                                      PublicKeyAlgorithm encPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                                      PublicKey encPublicKey,
                                      PrivateKey rootCAPrivateKey,
                                      Certificate rootCACertificate)
                                        throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                               SignatureException,
                                               IOException
        Method to generate an Authorization Authority signed by a Root CA certificate
        Parameters:
        subjectName - the subject name to use in the certificate, null for empty name. Max 32 bytes.
        itsAidList - list of ITS AID values, Required
        assuranceLevel - the assurance level to use, 0-7, Required
        confidenceLevel - the confidence level to use, 0-3, Required
        validFrom - the valid from date in certificate, Required
        validTo - the valid to date in certificate, Required
        geographicRegion - the region the certificate should be valid, null for no geographic region.
        signingPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for signing and verification, Required
        signPublicKey - public key used for verification of this certificate, Required
        encPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        encPublicKey - public key used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        rootCAPrivateKey - the private key of the root CA, Required
        rootCACertificate - the certificate of the root CA, Required
        Returns:
        a new authorization authority certificate.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if supplied arguments was illegal.
        SignatureException - if internal signature problems occurred.
        IOException - if communication problems with underlying systems occurred generating the certificate.

      • genEnrollmentAuthorityCA

        public Certificate genEnrollmentAuthorityCA(byte[] subjectName,
                                   List<BigInteger> itsAidList,
                                   int assuranceLevel,
                                   int confidenceLevel,
                                   Date validFrom,
                                   Date validTo,
                                   GeographicRegion geographicRegion,
                                   PublicKeyAlgorithm signingPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                                   PublicKey signPublicKey,
                                   PublicKeyAlgorithm encPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                                   PublicKey encPublicKey,
                                   PrivateKey rootCAPrivateKey,
                                   Certificate rootCACertificate)
                                     throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                            SignatureException,
                                            IOException
        Method to generate an Enrollment Authority signed by a Root CA certificate
        Parameters:
        subjectName - the subject name to use in the certificate, null for empty name. Max 32 bytes.
        itsAidList - list of ITS AID values, Required
        assuranceLevel - the assurance level to use, 0-7, Required
        confidenceLevel - the confidence level to use, 0-3, Required
        validFrom - the valid from date in certificate, Required
        validTo - the valid to date in certificate, Required
        geographicRegion - the region the certificate should be valid, null for no geographic region.
        signingPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for signing and verification, Required
        signPublicKey - public key used for verification of this certificate, Required
        encPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        encPublicKey - public key used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        rootCAPrivateKey - the private key of the root CA, Required
        rootCACertificate - the certificate of the root CA, Required
        Returns:
        a new enrollment authority certificate.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if supplied arguments was illegal.
        SignatureException - if internal signature problems occurred.
        IOException - if communication problems with underlying systems occurred generating the certificate.

      • genCA

        protected Certificate genCA(SubjectType subjectType,
                byte[] subjectName,
                List<BigInteger> itsAidList,
                int assuranceLevel,
                int confidenceLevel,
                Date validFrom,
                Date validTo,
                GeographicRegion geographicRegion,
                PublicKeyAlgorithm signingPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                PublicKey signPublicKey,
                PublicKeyAlgorithm encPublicKeyAlgorithm,
                PublicKey encPublicKey,
                PrivateKey caPrivateKey,
                Certificate caCertificate)
                     throws IllegalArgumentException,
                            SignatureException,
                            IOException
        Method to generate a self signed root CA.
        Parameters:
        subjectName - the subject name to use in the certificate, null for empty name. Max 32 bytes.
        itsAidList - list of ITS AID values, Required
        assuranceLevel - the assurance level to use, 0-7, Required
        confidenceLevel - the confidence level to use, 0-3, Required
        validFrom - the valid from date in certificate, Required
        validTo - the valid to date in certificate, Required
        geographicRegion - the region the certificate should be valid, null for no geographic region.
        signingPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for signing and verification, Required
        signPublicKey - public key used for verification of this certificate, Required
        encPublicKeyAlgorithm - algorithm used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        encPublicKey - public key used for encryption, null if no encryption key should be included.
        caPrivateKey - private key of CA signing this certificate, for self signed it's own private key, Required
        caCertificate - Certificate of CA signing this certificate, null indicates a self signed CA.
        Returns:
        a new CA certificate.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if supplied arguments was illegal.
        SignatureException - if internal signature problems occurred.
        IOException - if communication problems with underlying systems occurred generating the certificate.
